《汉ó英》重要 

【注】 以下翻译均为标准翻译

（

1）

计算机系统有两个基本的部分：硬件和软件。和计算机相连的是硬件。计算机硬件负责完成四个基本功能：输

入、处理、输出和存储。

译文： 

A computer system has two basic parts: hardware and software. The equipment associated with a

computer system is the hardware. Computer hardware is responsible for performing four basic

functions: input, processing, output, and storage.

输出设备是将处理过的信息显示给用户。两种最受欢迎的输出设备的形式是打印机和显示器。

译文： 

An output device displays the processed information to the user. The two most popular forms of

output devices are the printer and the monitor.

处理过程本身一般都发生在机箱里，机箱通常是但也不总是像一个盒子，它保护者机箱里的部件。

译文： 

The processing itself generally takes place in this case. The case is generally, but not always,

shaped like a box and it protects the components that are inside.

计算机硬盘或硬盘驱动器存储计算机的操作系统、安装在计算机上的程序和大部分文件

译文： 

The hard disk or hard drive stores your computer’s operating system, the programs that are stored

on your computer, and most of your files.

机箱里有很多电子部件和电机设备。这些部件一般都连接到称为主板或者系统板的电路板上。

译文： 

The system unit houses a variety of electronic components and electro-mechanical devices. These

are generally connected to the main circuit board which is called the motherboard or system

board.

当 PC 加电后，他使用 BIOS 的引导代码来启动很多必要的功能，使得 PC 达到准备工作的一个状态。 译文： 

When a PC is powered on it uses the BIOS “boot code” to set up many required functions that

bring the PC to a point where it is ready to work.

地理信息系统(GIS)，又称地理信息系统或地理空间信息系统，是一种获取、存储、分析和管理与地球空间相关

的数据和属性的系统.

译文：

A geographic information system (GIS), also known as a geographical information system or

geospatial information system, is a system for capturing, storing, analyzing and managing data

and associated attributes which are spatially referenced to the Earth.

硬件指的是我们能看到、摸到的计算机部分，包括机箱里的每一部分。

译文：

Hardware refers to the parts of a computer that you can see and touch, including the case and

everything inside it.

软件指的是装备或程序，即用来告诉硬件如何工作的。我们通常在计算机上用来写信的字处理程序就是软件的

一种。

译文： 

Software refers to the instructions, or programs, that tell the hardware what to do. A word

processing program that you can use to write letters on your computer is a type of software

操作系统就是管理你的计算机和连接到计算机上的设备。两个广为人知的操作系统就是 Windows 和 Mac OS。

译文： 

The operating system (OS) is software that manages your computer and the devices connected to it.

Two well-known operating systems are Windows and Mac OS.

2）

Primary storage also plays an integral part in the internal operation of a processor. These three—primary storage, the

control unit, and the arithmetic and logic unit —work together. Let’s look at their functions and the relationships

between them.

译文：

不加夸张地讲，市场上有几百种不同类型的计算机在销售.每种电脑在复杂性上可能有很大区别，但归根结底,

每种处理器，有时称为中央处理器即 cpu，只有两个基本部分:控制单元和计算逻辑单元.主内存在处理器内部

操作中也是一个不可缺少的部分.这三个部件——主内存，控制单元和计算逻辑单元——一起工作.然我们看看

它们(各自的)功能和它们之间的联系。

Another name for primary storage is random-access memory, or RAM. A special type of primary storage, called read

only memory (ROM), cannot be altered by the programmer. The contents of ROM are “hard-wired” (designed into the

logic of the memory chip) by the manufacturer and can be “read only”. When you turn on a microcomputer system, a

program in ROM automatically readiesthe computer system for use. Then the ROM program produces the initial display

screen prompt.

译文：

主存储器也称为随机存取存储器，或称作 RAM。还有一种特殊的主存储器称为只读存储器（ROM），这种存储器

不能被程序更改存放的内容。ROM 的内容是被生产商通过硬件电路写入的（即硬连线，是被设计写入存储芯片

逻辑的），并且不能被重写。当你启动计算机时， ROM 中的一个程序会自动就绪等待计算机系统的调用，然后

在显示器中显示开机提示。（Hard-wire：硬连线）The first phase, requirements definition, refers to the period during which the requirements of the system desired, that

is, it’s functional characteristics and operational details, are specified.

译文：

第一阶段，需求定义阶段，是指系统期望的需求分析，即描述功能特征和操作细节的阶段。

Another might be that the data must reflect the current state of the inventory as of the end of the last business day or

that the arrangement of the data as displayed on the computer screen must adhere to the format of the paper forms

currently in use.

译文：

另一种可能是当最后一个工作日结束时，数据必须反映目前的清单状态，或者可能是在计算机屏幕上的数据组

织必须按照目前使用的纸质形式的格式来显示。

Unit testing is done in a controlled environment whenever possible so that the test team can feed a predetermined set

of data to the module being tested and observe what output data are produced.

译文：

在任何可能的时候，单元测试是在控制环境下进行的，这是为了让测试小组能提供被测试模块先前确定的数据

并观察产生的输出数据。

Optical laser disk technology eventually may make magnetic-disk and magnetic tape storage obsolete. With this

technology, the read/write head used in magnetic storage is replaced by two lasers. One laser beam writes to the

recording surface by scoring microscopic pits in the disk, and another laser reads the data from the light-sensitive

recording surface. A light beam is easily deflected to the desired place on the optical disk, so an access arm is not needed.

译文：

光盘技术最终可能使磁盘和磁带存储淘汰(光盘技术最终能淘汰磁盘和磁带存储)。用这种技术，磁存储器所用

的读/写头被两束激光代替。一束激光通过在光盘上刻制微小的凹点，对记录表面进行写；而另一束激光用来从

光敏感的记录表面读取数据。由于光束容易被偏转到光盘上所需要的位置，所以不需要存取臂。

A WAN is a computer network that covers a broad area. This is in contrast with local area networks

(LANs), campus area networks (CANs), or metropolitan area networks (MANs) which are usually

limited to a building, campus or specific metropolitan area respectively. Its geographical scope

is more than 100km and transmission rate is less than 0.1Mbps.

译文：

广域网是一种覆盖广泛领域的计算机网络。它是与局域网(lan)、校园局域网(can)或城域网(MANs)相对而言的，

这些局域网通常分别局限于一个建筑、校园或特定的城域网。其地理范围超过 100 公里，传输速率小于 0.1Mbps。

Comment： There are six connection types are offered through the drop-down menu. Each Setup

screen and available features will vary depending on which connection type you select.

DHCP — If you are connecting through DHCP or a dynamic IP address from your ISP, keep this

default setting.

Static IP — If your ISP assigns you a static IP address, select Static IP from the drop

down menu. Complete the Internet IP Address, Subnet Mask, Default Gateway, and DNS fields. You

need to enter at least one DNS address.

译文：注释：下拉菜单提供了六种连接类型。每个设置屏幕和可用特性将根据您选择的连接类型而有所不同。

DHCP -如果您是通过 DHCP 或来自 ISP 的动态 IP 地址进行连接，就请保留此默认设置。

静态 IP—如果 ISP 为您分配了一个静态 IP 地址，请从下拉菜单中选择静态 IP。完成 Internet IP 地址、子网

掩码、默认网关和 DNS 字段。您需要输入至少一个 DNS 地址。

Unit testing is done in a controlled environment whenever possible so that the test team can feed

a predetermined set of data to the module being tested and observe what output data are produced.

译文：

在任何可能的时候，单元测试是在控制环境下进行的，这是为了让测试小组能提供被测试模块先前确定的数据

并观察产生的输出数据。

There are two ways to control the connection (association) of wireless client devices. You can

either prevent specific devices from connecting to the Wireless Router, or you can allow only

specific client devices to connect to the Wireless Router. The client devices are specified by

their MAC addresses.

译文：

有两种方法可以控制无线客户端设备的连接(关联)。您可以阻止特定的设备连接到无线路由器，也可以只允许

特定的客户机设备连接到无线路由器。客户端设备由它们的 MAC 地址指定。

《作业翻译—重要》 【注】 有道词典翻译

（

1）

1、The motherboard contains the Central Processing Unit, main memory (RAM), ROM chips (which hold

operating instructions), slots and various connections.

译文：

主板包含中央处理单元，主存储器(RAM)， ROM 芯片(持有操作指令)，插槽和各种连接。

2、Random Access Memory (RAM), which both can be read from and written to, is lost each time the

computer is turned off.

译文：

可读可写的随机存取存储器(RAM)在每次关机时都会丢失。

3、The system unit houses a variety of electronic components and electro-mechanical devices. These

are generally connected to the main circuit board which is called the motherboard or system board.

译文：

系统单元包含各种电子元件和机电设备。这些通常连接到主电路板上，主电路板称为主板或系统板。

4、CPU performs the majority of calculations and instructions needed to make your computer run.

It is often called the computer's "brain".

译文：

CPU 执行计算机运行所需的大部分计算和指令。它通常被称为计算机的“大脑”。

5、The hard disk or hard drive stores your computer's operating system, the programs that are

installed on your computer, and most of your files.

译文：

硬盘或硬盘驱动器存储您的计算机的操作系统，安装在您的计算机上的程序，以及您的大多数文件。

6、Read Only Memory (ROM), which cannot be written to, maintains its content at all times and is

used to store the computer's control information.

译文：

只读存储器(ROM)，它不能被写入，保持它的内容在任何时候，并被用来存储计算机的控制信息。

7、The Power Supply is the component most likely to fail during the life of the computer. It may

overheat or the cooling fan may fail.

译文：

电源是计算机寿命中最有可能发生故障的部件。可能会过热或冷却风扇失灵。

8、Floppy disks store less information than a hard disk drive and retrieve the information at a

much slower rate.

译文：

软盘存储的信息比硬盘驱动器少，检索信息的速度要慢得多。

9、When a PC is powered on it uses the BIOS 'boot code' to set up many required functions that

bring the PC to a point where it is ready to work.

译文：

当 PC 启动时，它使用 BIOS 的“引导代码”来设置许多必需的功能，使 PC 达到可以工作的状态。 10、Modern PCs will have at least 2 cooling fans: one for the power supply and one for the CPU.

译文：

现代电脑至少会有 2 个冷却风扇:一个用于供电，另一个用于 CPU。

（

2）

1、While the technologies used in computers have changed dramatically since the first electronic,

general-purpose computers of the 1940s, most still use the stored program architecture (sometimes

called the von Neumann architecture).

译文：

尽管自 20 世纪 40 年代第一台电子通用计算机以来，计算机技术发生了巨大变化，但大多数计算机仍然使用存

储程序架构(有时称为冯·诺依曼架构)。

2、Conceptually, a computer's memory can be viewed as a list of cells. Each cell has a numbered

"address" and can store a small, fixed amount of information.

译文：

从概念上讲，计算机的内存可以看作是细胞的列表。每个单元都有一个编号的“地址”，可以存储少量、固定数

量的信息。

3、The ALU is in many senses the heart of the computer. It is capable of performing two classes

of basic operations.

译文：

在许多意义上，ALU 是计算机的核心。它能够执行两类基本操作。

4、The I/O systems are the means by which the computer receives information from the outside world,

and reports its results back to that world.

译文：

I/O 系统是计算机接收来自外部世界的信息，并将其结果报告给外部世界的方法。

5、Since the 1980s the ALU and control unit (collectively called a central processing unit or CPU)

have typically been located on a single integrated circuit called a microprocessor.

译文：

自 1980 年代以来，ALU 和控制单元(统称为中央处理单元或 CPU)通常位于称为微处理器的单个集成电路上。

6、Supercomputers often have highly unusual architectures significantly different from the basic

stored-program architecture, sometimes featuring thousands of CPUs, but such designs tend to be

useful only for specialized tasks.

译文：

超级计算机通常具有极不寻常的体系结构，与基本的存储程序体系结构显著不同，有时具有数千个 cpu，但这

种设计往往只对特定任务有用。

7、To overcome the problem of losing information when the computer is switched off, the contents

of the computer's memory (referred to as primary storage) should be saved to a secondary storage

device.

译文：

为了克服计算机关闭时丢失信息的问题，计算机的存储器(称为主存储器)的内容应该被保存到一个辅助存储设

备。 8、CPU performance is roughly determined by clock speed (the speed at which a microprocessor

executes instructions) and data width/specific architecture.

译文：

CPU 性能大致由时钟速度(微处理器执行指令的速度)和数据宽度/特定架构决定。

9、The performance of a computer can be measured using other metrics, mainly depending upon its

application domain.

译文：

计算机的性能可以使用其他指标来衡量，主要取决于它的应用领域。

10、In a balanced computer system, the data rate will be constant for all parts of the system,

and cost will be allocated proportionally to assure this.

译文：

在一个平衡的计算机系统中，系统的所有部分的数据速率将是恒定的，成本将按比例分配以确保这一点。

6）摘要翻译 汉译英 

英文摘要翻译 1、

Abstract: Network virtualization can serve as the important technology for constructing the next

generation Internet architecture.

It has been proposed as a powerful vehicle for running multiple architectures or experiments

simultaneously on a shared infrastructure.

It allows multiple service providers to offer customized end-to-end services over a common

physical infrastructure.

Virtual network embedding is a critical step for network virtualization that deals with the

efficient mapping of virtual nodes and virtual links onto the substrate network resources.

The virtual network-mapping problem is extremely challenging for four main practical reasons: Node and link constraints, admission control, online request, and diverse topologies.

Due to different application scenarios, optimization objectives, mapping approaches, and

constraints, there are many virtual network-mapping models.

Unfortunately, the optimization problems of these models are generally NP-hard. The model of

virtual network mapping is presented. The virtual network mapping methods and algorithms are

concluded.

The technological approaches to solve the optimization problems of the virtual network mapping

are summarized.

Finally, some open issues are presented to be further studied in the virtual network-mapping

field.

Key words: network virtualization; virtual network mapping; optimization algorithm; integer

programming

标准译文：

网络虚拟化能作为用于构造下一代网路架构的重要技术来服务。它已经被提议作为在共享公共设施上同时

运行多个架构或者实验的一个强大的工具。

它允许多个服务供应商通过一个普通的物理基础设施来提供定制的端到端的服务。嵌入式虚拟网络对于处

理虚拟节点和虚拟链接到底层网络资源的高效映射的网络虚拟化是关键性的一步。

虚拟网络映射问题非常具有挑战性，主要有四个实际原因：节点和链接约束、进入控制、联机请求、不同

的拓扑结构。由于不同的应用场景、优化目标、映射方法和约束，所以有许多的虚拟网络映射模型。

不幸的，这些模型的优化问题通常是 NP-hard(非确定性多项式困难问题)。虚拟网络映射模型被提出了。

虚拟网络映射方法和算法被总结了出来，这些用于解决虚拟网络映射的优化问题的技术方法被概括了出来。

最终，在虚拟网络映射领域，提出了一些开放性的有待进一步研究的问题。

关键词:网络虚拟化，虚拟网络映射，优化算法，整数规划。

英文摘要翻译 2、

Abstract: Active network endues the network nodes with capability of computing and programming

and network action can be controlled through the custom-built programs in the network nodes, so

the network architecture are more agile and more expansionary. At the same time, there are more

hidden troubles which are not found in the traditional network. Base on the analysis of active

network, this article introduced some techniques which can ease the troubles in active network,

and put forward the network security architecture, and studied the measures of protecting capsules.

Key words: active network， network security， network architecture，capsule

摘 要:主动网络赋予了网络中间节点一定的计算能力和编程能力，用户可以通过在节点中定制程序来控制网络

行为。这使得网络体系结构更具灵活性和可扩张性，但也带来了传统网络中没有的安全隐患问题。在分析主动

网络基本特征的基础上，指出了主动网络安全潜在的安全问题，讨论了主动网络的安全技术，提出了主动网络

的安全体系结构，研究了主动信包保护和隔离的措施。

关键词：主动网络；网络安全；网络体系结构；主动信包

英文摘要翻译 3、

Abstract:

The basic concepts of intrusion detection technique are discussed. On the basis of analyzing the

existing problems of current intrusion detection systems, an adaptive intrusion detection system

model architecture based on data mining is proposed.

摘要：

讨论了入侵检测系统的基本概念。对于当前的入侵检测系统中存在的问题，提出了一个基于数据挖掘技术的适合的入侵检测系统模型。

The basic theory of the system model is introduced, and its structure and main function are

expounded. Data mining process is also analyzed. Using data mining, significant features, new

patterns and interesting rules can be automatically extracted from volumes of data, and the

detection models can be built.

介绍了系统模型的基本理论，阐述了它的结构和主要功能。并且也分析了数据挖掘过程。使用数据挖掘，重要

特点是，能把新的模式和有意义的规则自动从大量数据中提取出来，并且建立检测模型。

Finally, some advantages of the model are briefly presented and show that it is very stable.

When simulating DDOS(Distribute Denial of Service) attack on the real environment with bursting

packages, the Web server and all connection can work normally.

Key words: intrusion detection; network security; data mining.

最终，一些模型的优点被简要呈现以及显示出它是稳定的。当在真实环境中带着爆破包装来模拟

DDOS（分布式拒绝服务）攻击时，Web 服务器和所有的连接能正常工作。

关键词: 入侵检测，网络安全，数据挖掘

英文摘要翻译 4

网络视频重复检测算法研究

摘要

Algorithm research of network video duplicate detection

Abstract:

随着网络上视频数量的增长，网络视频中往往存在着大量重复的(duplicate)或近似重复的(near-duplicate)视频。

这些大量的重复视频不仅浪费了存储空间，也给视频的有效管理带来不便，并且给用户在网络上搜索感兴趣的

视频时返回过多的重复结果。因此，为了提高网络视频的管理、检索及浏览效率，高效的视频重复检测方法就

显得十分必要。除此之外，视频重复检测技术还具有广阔的应用前景，包括新闻图像或新闻视频的跟踪、商标

侵权检测等等。

With the growth of the number of videos on the network, generally there are a great number of duplicate or near

duplicate videos among the network videos. And they return too many duplicate results when users are searching the

interesting videos on the network. Consequently, improving the efficiency of management, retrieval and browsing of

network video, the efficient video duplicate detection method is becoming very necessary. Besides, video repeat

detection technology also has broad application prospects, including news images or news videos tracking, trademark

infringement detection and so on.

本文重点研究基于内容的网络视频重复检测方法。传统的视频重复检测方法是基于文本的检索方法，这类方法

需要大量的人工标注。而基于内容的检测方法包括基于全局特征的方法和基于局部关键点匹配的方法。

This paper focuses on network video duplicate detection method based on content. The traditional video duplicate

detection method is the retrieval method based on text, and this needs enormous manual annotations. But the

detection method based on content includes the method based on global features and the method based on local key

point matching.

基于全局特征的方法其特点是检测速度快，对那些几乎完全相同的视频或者具有简单场景的视频能取得较好的

检测结果，但是很难检测那些在内容上做了一些改变(颜色、光照、插入或删除了若干帧等)的重复视频。而基于

局部关键点的方法虽然能较准确地检测那些具有复杂场景的视频，但是检测过程非常耗时。而视频检索系统不

仅要求精确率还要求实时性。

. The method based on global features feature is the quick detection speed, which can get better detection results for

almost the same videos or videos with simple scenes, but it is difficult to detect duplicate videos which have made some changes in content (color, illumination, insertion or deletion of dry frames....).While although the method based on local

key points can detect accurately those videos with complex scenes, the detection process is very time-consuming. Video

retrieval system requires not only accuracy but also real-time feature.

因此，本文提出了一种新的基于镜头层比较(Shot Level Comparison, SLC)的精确最近邻查找的视频重复检测方法

(SLC+NNS)，该方法在镜头层定义了一个新的特征：镜头签名(Shot Signature)，然后将视频的镜头看作一个比较

单元，通过视频间匹配镜头的比例来判断视频的相似性。除此之外，为了进一步提高 SLC+NNS 方法的检测速度，

本文将 LSH 近似最近邻查找技术用于镜头层比较来快速查找相似镜头，得到了基于镜头层比较和 LSH 技术的快

速视频重复检测算法(SLC+LSH)。实验结果表明，使用本文的 SLC+NNS 方法，得到了很好的检测性能，并且速度

很快，特别是对于复杂场景的视频重复检测性能明显优于基于全局特征的方法(Sig-CH)和基于上下文的方法

(CONT+CONX)，而且在准确性上与目前最好的基于局部关键点匹配的 HIRACH 方法几乎完全一样，但速度比

FIIRACH 方法快数万倍。而结合 LSH 技术后的 SLC+LSH 方法，在准确率没有明显下降的情况下，速度比 SLC+NNS

方法提高了很多倍。

关键词：视频重复检测，镜头层比较，LSH，镜头签名，局部关键点

Therefore, this paper proposes a new SLC + NNS method based on SLC. This method defines a new feature in shot level:

shot signature and then regard the shot of video as a comparison unit, and judge the similarity of video by the proportion

of matching shots among videos. Besides, to improve the detection speed of SLC + NNS method, this paper uses LSH

approximate nearest neighbor search technology in the shot layer comparison to search similar shots fast, and gets a

fast video repeat detection algorithm (SLC + LSH) based on shot layer comparison and LSH technology. The experiment’s

result shows that using the SLC + NNs method of this paper can get a great detection performance and the speed is very

fast. Especially for the video repeat detection performance of complex scenes, which is obviously better than the

method based on global feature (SIG CH) and the method based on context (cont + conx), and the accuracy is almost

the same as the current best HIRACH method based on local key matching, while the speed is tens of thousands of times

faster than fiirach method. But the SLC + LSH method which combines with LSH technology can improve the speed much

more than the SLC + NNs method when the accuracy is not declined obviously.

Key words： video repeat detection, lens layer comparison, LSH, lens signature, local key points

《英语中的加减乘除》

1、数词

表示数目多少或顺序多少的词叫数词，数词分为基数词和序数词。表示数目多少的数词叫基数词；表示顺序的

数词叫序数词。

一、基数词

(1)基数词写法和读法： 345

(2)基数词一般是单数形式，但下列情况，常用复数：

a. 与 of 短语连用，表示概数，不能与具体数目连 用，如

指许多人；

b. 在一些表示一排或一组的词组里；

如：

他们三三两两的到达了。

c. 表示几十岁；

d. 表示年代，用 in +the +数词复数；

e. 在乘法运算的一种表示法里，如：3 x 5 = 15

二、序数词

序数词的缩写形式：

三、 数词的用法

(1)倍数表示法

a. 主语+谓语+倍数（或分数）+ as + adj. + as

我有你三倍那么多。

b. 主语+谓语+倍数（分数）+ the size (amount，length…) of…

地球是月球的 49 倍。

c. 主语+谓语+倍数（分数）+ 形容词（副词）比较级+ than…

今年比去年粮食产量增加 8%。

d. 还可以用 by+倍数，表示增加多少倍

今年粮食产量增加了 4 倍。

(2)分数表示法

构成：基数词代表分子，序数词代表分母。分子大于 1 时，分子的序数词用单数，分母序数词用复数：

1/3

； 3/37

.2、数学算式的口语练习；

*加*；

是*减*；

*乘以*；

*除以*；

等于。

注意：用英文讲解。

《课外阅读》

【注】文章大意由有道词典翻译而来，可能会有语句不通的情况。

1、Today’s Wall Street Journal tells how some companies have begun making more use of their own

Web sites, along with social network sites like Facebook and LinkedIn, to find new staff. In some

cases, this shift in recruiting strategy comes at the expense of traditional advertising on job

boards.

今天的《华尔街日报》报道了一些公司如何开始更多地利用他们自己的网站，以及像 Facebook 和 LinkedIn

这样的社交网站来招聘新员工。在某些情况下，这种招聘策略的转变是以牺牲招聘网站上的传统广告为代价的。

2、For years, companies have announced job opening on their Web sites and encouraged their employees

to refer promising prospects for those openings. With social network sites, however, companies

can use the Web to expand their exposure to prospects and still take advantage of personal

referrals. If the enterprises can save a few bucks on not placing job ads, that’s an added

benefit.

多年来，公司都会在网站上公布招聘信息，并鼓励员工推荐有前景的职位。然而，通过社交网站，公司可

以利用网络来扩大他们的潜在客户，同时还可以利用个人推荐。如果企业可以在不发布招聘广告的情况下节省

一些钱，这是一个额外的好处。

3、The article tells how high-tech companies Adobe (graphics and publishing software) and Intuit

(tax and accounting software) have started making more use of their own Web sites for recruiting.

Both companies tell the Journal that recruiting through their own sites better conveys the

companies’ values and culture, which are important factors for prospects to understand before

applying. The Adobe site has videos showing a day in the life of employees, including one staffer

who starts his day surfing at a 6:00 am. Adobe says it makes little use of job boards. The article

quotes an Intuit manager who says the company will not abandon job boards completely–but wants

to rely more on viral marketing.

这篇文章讲述了高科技公司 Adobe(图像和出版软件)和 Intuit(税务和会计软件)如何开始更多地利用自己的网站招聘。这两家公司都告诉《华尔街日报》，通过他们自己的网站招聘能更好地传达公司的价值观和文化，

这是应聘者在申请前需要了解的重要因素。Adobe 网站上有员工一天生活的视频，其中一名员工早上 6 点就开

始上网。Adobe 表示，它很少使用求职网站。这篇文章引用了一位 Intuit 经理的话，他说公司不会完全放弃招

聘板块，而是希望更多地依靠病毒式营销。

4、The HR manager at Facebook says, not surprisingly, that the company uses the viral qualities

of Facebook to find top talent. “One of our main philosophies is to get smart and talented people.

They tend to be connected,” she says, adding that about half of Facebook’s new hires come through

referrals. The article notes the experiences of food-service company Sodexo and online retailer

Zappos.com in using Facebook and LinkedIn for referrals, with Sodexo claiming it saves hundreds

of thousands of dollars a year in job advertising.

Facebook 的人力资源经理说，公司利用 Facebook 的病毒式传播来寻找顶级人才，这并不奇怪。“我们的主

要理念之一是培养聪明有才华的人。她补充称，Facebook 约有一半的新员工是通过推荐获得的。文章提到了食

品服务公司索迪斯(Sodexo)和在线零售商 Zappos.com 使用 Facebook 和领英(LinkedIn)进行引荐的经历，索迪

斯声称这样每年可以节省数十万美元的招聘广告费用。

5、 For applicants, getting connected means establishing an online presence on social network

sites, using that presence to convey a professional image, and using the community features of

the sites to make that presence known to prospective employers. The article offers hints on

researching companies online, with sites like hoovers.com, to find companies that may be hiring

people with your particular skills.

对求职者来说，与他人建立联系意味着在社交网站上建立自己的在线形象，利用这种形象传达专业形象，

并利用网站的社区特性让潜在雇主知道自己的这种形象。这篇文章提供了一些建议，可以通过像 hoovers.com

这样的网站在网上搜索公司，寻找那些可能会雇佣具有你特殊技能的人的公司。

6、On Science Careers, Dave Jensen has discussed how LinkedIn can aid your job search, and Lucas

Laursen has talked about social network sites for scientists.

在《科学职业》中，Dave Jensen 讨论了 LinkedIn 如何帮助你找工作，Lucas Laursen 谈到了科学家的社

交网站。

7、Full disclosure: Science Careers has a job board and gains income from job advertising.

完全披露:科学职业有一个工作公告板，通过招聘广告获得收入。
